features.name: BI Unfuck Systemss
features.description: Core engine-level fixes and overrides for BI AI behaviour, configs, and scheduling. Everything else depends on this.

features.name: Unified AI State Machine Core
features.description: Unified AI state machine core that all infantry, vehicles and artillery logic can plug into.

features.name: Vision Limiting
features.description: AI will have a slower detection time at night and will aim less accurate in night time.
